document_data.name: Szarr Mansion
document_data.mainbody: '''Szarr Mansion''' was a ruined manor in [[Tumbledown]], a district in the [[Outer City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]].
document_data.Exterior: The manor was aged and mostly burned due to an arson.
document_data.Location: Szarr Mansion was located in the middle of [[Cliffside Cemetery]].
document_data.History: Centuries ago, a rival merchant family broke in and razed the properties of the [[Szarr]] family. Since then, [[ghost]]s of the family stalked the halls of the manor. In [[1492 DR]], the [[Gravebreakers]] made this their base.
